item.description:
Yeh its a last minute thought..

I need some more excersize and dont want to go to a loud bar on a Friday night to get drunk..dont like booze anyway..(only a glass or 2 of good wine)..thats all.....and i dont want that tonight either..kayak trip tomorrow...
Now if you feel the same way and
if you are close and dont have to drive far and just want a hour or so of a walk down and back from Comstock Ferre to the cove looking at the historic houses along the way and back let me know..im going to walk anyway..

Getting There: 91 north or south exit. 26 Follow signs to OLD WETHERSFIELD....head to Main Street,
AT the flagpole in the green at the center take a right towards Comstock Ferre, At the Comstock Ferre there is a Gazebo and a Bench out in the front...I will be there.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Last Minute Thought of Walking Old Wethersfield Main Street
